Topic.Title: Hulu in Compare (Monthly Unique Visitors from Siteanaytics)

Message.Msg: If Tumblr went for 1.1 billion.....I am sure it will take that much to get Hulu. I have heard somewhere Hulu believes it is worth between 1 to 2 billion. Mayer is making bold moves securing Brains and Content to Bolster Yahoo's future.

Topic.Title: It is a joke, that Tumbrl has the 27-fold price and Yelp the 50-fold market-cap of Local Corp, but both less US-Monthly-Unique-Visitors (newest numbers from Siteanalytics)

Message.Msg: • Access to a Desirable Demographic of Decision-Makers Local Corps patented and proprietary technology allows to consolidate an amalgamated and disparate set of local business listings, information and other data and combine it into a targeted, highly relevant results-set, which is presented in a useful and compelling manner. A majority of users on Local Corps flagship-site are females, aged between 25 and 45, with at least one child at home (the so-called “soccer moms”), a demographic that is deemed by many to be highly desirable because they generally have responsibility for 89% of bank accounts, 80% of healthcare decisions, and 50% of do-it-yourself projects and consumer product purchases. We designed the utility of our website to appeal to this group of targeted users.

Topic.Title: "Yahoo’s Bid for Hulu in $600M to $800M Range — Even as It Preps Other Big Deals in Mobile and Communications"

Message.Msg: To me this seems to be a four corner game. Yahoo in one corner. Chernin in the opposite corner. DirecTV taking a third corner and Guggenheim Partners, where former Yahoo Ross Levinsohn is CEO of Digital Media which just bought #$%$ Clark Productions and owns the Hollywood Reporter, completing the square. What a lovely fight this is going to be.

Topic.Title: "Yahoo’s Bid for Hulu in $600M to $800M Range — Even as It Preps Other Big Deals in Mobile and Communications"

Message.Msg: Yes exactly. With Chernin backed up by Providence money and don't count out Silver Lake/WME. Do we know if KKR is backing someone or are they solo?

Topic.Title: "Yahoo’s Bid for Hulu in $600M to $800M Range — Even as It Preps Other Big Deals in Mobile and Communications"

Message.Msg: My got feeling YHOO will win the bid for one very good reason: YHOO is perfect to HULU. YHOO can enhance HULU while Chernin does not . YHOO got most extensive contents so DIS and NWS will go for YHOO. They will probably leave some investment money to YHOO because they know HULU will be in good hands.

Topic.Title: "Yahoo’s Bid for Hulu in $600M to $800M Range — Even as It Preps Other Big Deals in Mobile and Communications"

Message.Msg: Yep, was thinking this week-end that Yahoo! is in the best position of this group. Hulu has lost some top talent in the last few months & Yahoo! is the best equipped to fill those gaps.

Message.Msg: Few missing 10s of Billions is due to search deal with msft. Carol B. kiiled Yahoo in many ways. Employees were teated like trash. I had colleagues there who felt suffocated at Yahoo and left. Things are improving a bit. Yahoo just from search was worth 15B or so. Carol B. made is worth 0.
